wikipedia_page.main: Joseph Nash was an English professional footballer who played as a wing half.

response: *Joseph Nash (1809–1878), English watercolor painter and lithographer

Joseph Nash (17 December 180919 December 1878) was an English watercolour painter and lithographer, specialising in historical buildings. His major work was the 4-volume Mansions of England in the Olden Time, published from 1839–49.
His only son, Joseph Nash Jr., was a marine painter and a member of the Royal Institute of Painters in Water-Colours.
